prod_short_desc: Make a cake for Berry’s tea party!
prod_long_desc:
With LEGO® | Disney Whisker Haven Tales with the Palace Pets™, the beloved royal pets of your favorite Disney Princess characters can all meet and play together. Berry’s Kitchen is the perfect venue for a woodland tea party, and it’s modular, so you can rebuild it in different ways for more baking fun. Includes Berry.
Includes Berry, Snow White's pet bunny.
Berry's Kitchen features a modular kitchen with a buildable breakfast bar and stools, display table, cake stand and a special tree gate.
Build Berry's kitchen and get it ready for a woodland tea party.
Pick berries from the iconic tree gate and use them to customize the cake.
Accessory elements include berries, a carrot, teapot, basket and two cups.
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 5-12.
Berry's Kitchen measures over 2” high, 5” wide and 1” long.
Combine the window display and tree-gate baseplates with the 41142 Palace Pets Royal Castle for a unique Palace Pets play experience.
